physical_appearance:This is a photograph of a road in Buitenzorg (Bogor) in Indonesia. There is a wide empty dirt road in the center of the photograph. On either side of the photograph
 there are rows of Banyan trees
 creating a canopy over the road. The top-right corner of the photograph is slightly folded. The title is handwritten at the bottom
 below the photograph.

metadata.physical_appearance: This is a photograph of a road in Buitenzorg (Bogor) in Indonesia. There is a wide empty dirt road in the center of the photograph. On either side of the photograph, there are rows of Banyan trees, creating a canopy over the road. The top-right corner of the photograph is slightly folded. The title is handwritten at the bottom, below the photograph.
